TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithTopMultiNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT random_udf(a1) as a2, random_udf(a1) as a3 FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, b FROM MyTable) t WHERE b > 10

LogicalProject(a2=[random_udf($0)], a3=[random_udf($0)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[random_udf(a1) AS a2, random_udf(a1) AS a3]) +- Calc(select=[random_udf(a) AS a1, b], where=[(b > 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[], project=[a, b], metadata=[]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeTopFilterHasNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM (SELECT a, random_udf(b) as b1, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE b1 > 10
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b1=[random_udf($1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, c], where=[(random_udf(b) > 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithBottomMultiNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b2 FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, random_udf(b) as b2, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE c > 10

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(CAST($2):BIGINT, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b2=[random_udf($1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[random_udf(a) AS a1, random_udf(b) AS b2], where=[(CAST(c AS BIGINT) > 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithBottomMultiNonDeterministicInConditionExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, random_udf(b) as b2, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE a1 > b2

LogicalProject(c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b2=[random_udf($1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[c], where=[(random_udf(a) > random_udf(b))]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithNonDeterministicExpr1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a1 FROM (SELECT a, random_udf(a) AS a1 FROM MyTable) t WHERE a1 > 10
LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[random_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, a1], where=[(a1 > 10)]) +- Calc(select=[a, random_udf(a) AS a1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a], metadata=[]]], fields=[a])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithNonDeterministicExpr2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT random_udf(a1) as a2 FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, b FROM MyTable) t WHERE b > 10
LogicalProject(a2=[random_udf($0)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[random_udf(random_udf(a)) AS a2], where=[(b > 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[], project=[a, b], metadata=[]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithNonDeterministicNestedExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a1 FROM (SELECT a, substr(cast(random_udf(a) as varchar), 1, 2) AS a1 FROM MyTable) t WHERE a1 > '10'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, _UTF-16LE'10')]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[SUBSTR(CAST(random_udf($0)):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE" NOT NULL, 1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[a, a1], where=[(a1 > '10')]) +- Calc(select=[a, SUBSTR(CAST(random_udf(a) AS VARCHAR(2147483647)), 1, 2) AS a1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a], metadata=[]]], fields=[a])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithSameDigest
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM (SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE a = b) t WHERE b = a

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a = b)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[], project=[a, b], metadata=[]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithoutInnerNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM (SELECT a, random_udf(a) as a1, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE c > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(CAST($2):BIGINT, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[random_udf($0)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, c], where=[(CAST(c AS BIGINT) > 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[], project=[a, c], metadata=[]]], fields=[a, c])
